message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase this product. I believe its value will bring you significant returns. I'm initially offering it at $1,400,000.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to negotiate a better price. I'm willing to pay $1,100,000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a competitive price.  While I value your interest, $1,100,000 is below my bottom line.  I could consider $1,300,000. This feels like a fair compromise that acknowledges the true worth of this product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
